attributes.action: A basic income for each household or individual will keep the economy going
attributes.additional_details: Later down the line a new internet tax levy or some sort of money orientated tax will fund it... it's a new idea with some successful trial runs...... come in Boris step up it will be the making of the future of the generations to come..... everything is possible except the impossible
attributes.background: It is time to make this monumental  desicion to issue some form of universal payment. It will help business and the individual  if not I fear a total collapse of society as we know it and mass civil unrest
